name: Wonderboom
features: Spacious and airy space with floor-to-ceiling windows, plush cushions, and long tables. Includes a private room for up to 20 people.
address: Level 1, 129, Lorong Lapangan Terbang 2, Green Heights, 93250 Kuching, Sarawak

name: James Brooke Bistro & Cafe
features: Colonial-style riverside dining with Western and local dishes. Famous for beef rendang and Sarawak laksa pizza.
address: Waterfront, Jalan Tun Abang Haji Openg, 93000 Kuching

name: The Junk
features: Eclectic decor with Asian-Western fusion dishes. Must-try: Black pepper steak and salted egg pasta.

name: Zinc Restaurant & Bar
features: Industrial-chic vibe with craft cocktails and gourmet burgers. Live music on weekends.

name: Lepau Restaurant
features: Authentic Dayak cuisine in a traditional longhouse setting. Try the bamboo chicken and jungle ferns.

name: Sin Chong Choon Cafe
features: Legendary Sarawak laksa spot with rich, aromatic broth. Arrive early to avoid queues.
address: 801-1B Jalan Datuk Bandar Mustapha, Green Heights, 93350 Kuching, Sarawak

name: Bla Bla Bla
features: Artistic ambiance with creative Peranakan-inspired dishes. Signature: 3-layer tea pork ribs.

name: The Granary
features: Modern gastropub with craft beers and fusion tapas. Try their laksa carbonara.

name: Rumah Asap
features: Specializes in smoked Dayak meats and traditional jungle produce.

name: The Dyak
features: Rooftop seafood haven with fresh catches cooked to order. Famous for butter prawns and chili crab.
